job_history.work_description: Conceptualizing and spearheading new HR initiatives, development and management of an effective and responsive human resource functions, as well as leading the HR team in the full spectrum of human resource activities.

Transformed HR from administrative role to strategic business partner, including working with management level to drive key business and implement performance initiative, conducted extensive analysis of existing HR Organization and Development business plan to up dated all policies, procedure, service, program and operation.

Promoted to fulfill a broad range of HR functions, including Purchasing and General Administration to ensuring that meet the company's goal Human Resource Handle and Played a key role in ensuring the successful of a full spectrum of all HR Operation system and program.

skills.name: Human Resource Management
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in HR roles, including leading HR teams and developing HR initiatives, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Consistently held leadership positions, including HR Manager and General Administration Asst. Chief, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented HR strategies, including performance initiatives and business plans, suggesting strong proficiency in strategic planning.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Led HR teams and worked with management levels to drive key business initiatives, indicating strong proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Policy Development
skills.explanation: Updated HR policies, procedures, and programs, showing a solid working proficiency in policy development.

skills.name: Public Administration
skills.explanation: Holds a Master's degree in Public Administration, but there is limited evidence of direct application in their work experience, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Education
skills.explanation: Holds a Bachelor's degree in Education, but there is no evidence of direct application in their work experience, suggesting basic familiarity.
